CustomField.description: This is a required field. This field is the identifier used to identify and retrieve a loan or application that contains the FI's LEI, an internally generated sequence of characters, and a check digit
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ULI begins with the financial institution's Legal Entity Identifier. Follows the Legal Entity Identifier with up to 23 additional characters to identify the covered loan or application. Ends with a two-character check digit that is calculated using
CustomField.label: Universal Loan Identifier (ULI)
